title: Oracle WebLogic Server IIOP Protocol Deserialization of Untrusted Data Denial-of-Service Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations of Oracle WebLogic Server. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of the IIOP protocol. Crafted data in an IIOP protocol message can trigger the deserialization of untrusted data. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create a denial-of-service condition on the system.
addtionnal_details: Oracle has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/cpujan2023.html
timeline:
2022-07-08 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-03-15 - Coordinated public release of advisory
